items.sentence: Tom said he wanted to learn how to tie a square knot.
Tom said he was determined to find out what happened.
I\'ve been trained to deal with this kind of problem.
I\'ve been trying to get a little exercise every day.
I\'ve heard that Tom buys things on the black market.
What would you do if this was your last day on Earth?
I can hear traffic noise all night long where I live.
No, Mary isn\'t my stepsister, she\'s my half sister.
I\'m sure that she has arrived at the village by now.
I heard that Tom\'s boss refused to give him a raise.
I hope I\'m not the only one who thinks this is true.
I have an important meeting to attend this afternoon.
I hope Tom has finally found what he was looking for.
What\'s the good of having a car if you don\'t drive?
What\'s the real reason Tom doesn\'t want to do that?
I told Tom you would probably like to see that movie.
I visited the town for the first time in a long time.
I wish I knew what happened to all our family photos.
I wish girls found me as attractive as they find Tom.
What\'s the most expensive thing you\'ve ever bought?
